original_title: 闇動画　恐怖コレクション
overview: Psychic, occult, grotesque, violence, madness, psychotic... The introduction to the popular Japanese horror series featuring horrifying, shocking and taboo images of videos that cameras caught! Collection of popular 3 episodes from volume 1 to volume 3. Including "Cursed Box" that results in tragic ending of the camera crews who played ouija board at the abandoned hotel.
tagline: Do you believe what camera catches in the darkness?
title: Tokyo Videos of Horror Panic Collection
